mapper.select: SELECT ppa.PROJECT_ID , ppa. NAME , ppa.SEGMENT1 , ppa.PROJECT_TYPE , ppa.START_DATE , ppa.COMPLETION_DATE, ppa.CLOSED_DATE, ppa.PROJECT_STATUS_CODE FROM pa_projects_all ppa WHERE ppa.SEGMENT1 = ${project_code} AND ppa.PROJECT_TYPE = ${project_type} AND ppa.PROJECT_STATUS_CODE = ${project_state} AND ppa.START_DATE >= ${start_Date}
